text: @NYGovCuomo @lorrie_e And the leadership of @realDonaldTrump will make that happen! His early closure of inbound international travel, alone, saved 10s of 1000s of lives. @POTUS is putting #AmericaFirst & #WeThePeople r very grateful. Best wishes 2 all n #NewYork. #COVID19 WILL NOT best u! #GodBless

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
